links: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..50
mathematica: Table[Product[10^i-1,{i,n}],{n,0,10}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 15 2011 *)Abs@QPochhammer[10, 10, Range[0, 30]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 24 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = prod(k=1, n, 10^k - 1) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Nov 25 2015(MAGMA) [1] cat [&*[10^k-1: k in [1..n]]: n in [1..11]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 24 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
